Collection.name: Records
Collection.type: Eamon.ThirdParty.BTree`1[[Eamon.Framework.IMonster, Eamon, Version=1.6.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], Eamon, Version=1.6.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a giant rat.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a giant rat.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a giant rat.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a giant rat.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a giant rat.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a giant rat.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a big, nasty looking guy with a sword that's seen lots of use. He turns to use it.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a man wearing the uniform of the Guards of Ngurct. He sees you, too, and readies his axe.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see an ogre, all eight feet of him, with black and red splotches all over his body. He says, "Ungh," and turns to face you.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a big guy with a big mace. He doesn't like your looks. You can tell.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a goblin in shining chainmail. He sees you and readies his broadsword.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A beautiful girl stumbles into the @@005! Her skimpy attire is composed of rags. She cowers in fear.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A guard enters the @@005!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: An orc walks into the @@005!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A guard walks into the @@005!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A goblin enters the @@005!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A bugbear walks into the @@005!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A man in rags enters the @@005!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: An orc walks into the @@005!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A hobgoblin walks into the @@005!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A huge giant strides into the @@005!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A guard steps into the @@005!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: An orc steps into the @@005!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A goblin walks into the @@005!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A bugbear walks into the @@005!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A man in tattered oriental garb enters the @@005!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Zapata, one of the prisoners, welcomes you to his humble home.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Sir Charles

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: One of the prisoners is the good Sir Charles, who wears the tattered remnants of his clothes with noble dignity. "Greetings,@@001" says he. "And about time."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a beautiful princess bound to the altar; she was obviously the high priest's next sacrifice. When you distract the priest, she is able to free herself and grab the sacrificial dagger.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A guard straightens up from the brazier. He sees you and pulls a red-hot poker from the coals.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a man in the uniform of the guards of Ngurct; but he's wearing some strange insignia. He's also holding a very nasty sword.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a puny guy who's old and grey. He is wearing a conical hat with magical symbols on it. He is startled to see you, and seems panicked. He awkwardly readies a sword.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A man whirls from the bed. He is naked but is armed with a wicked sword, with which he was slicing up a slave girl. He turns, cries "How dare you, infidel!" and prepares to slice you up.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: high priest

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The high priest turns from the black and bloodstained altar. He carefully puts down the sacrificial dagger he was sharpening and whips out an elaborate sword. "Those who defile the Temple of Ngurct -- DIE!"

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Another priest turns from before a black statue to attack.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: As you enter, a bugbear who was playing cards with an orc rises and readies its axe.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The loot is not unguarded, however. You see a giant giant, a truly large critter who looks at you and smiles. "Mmmm." he says. "Food."

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are in combat! You have walked into the middle of a fight between a goblin and a handsome man.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see the captain of the citadel outer guard -- a mid-sized hobgoblin (which is still pretty big). He is not at all pleased to see you.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a frightened kobold standing indecisively by the rack.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a sword-wielding orc wearing leather armor.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: An animated skeleton rattles out from amongst the rubble!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: An animated skeleton rattles out of the rubble!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A ghoul attacks from the shadows!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A minotaur whirls to face you as you enter. He snorts, his huge shoulders bulging, and paws the ground with his feet. He swings his immense double-bladed axe and -- charges!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see the source of the musty smell shuffling towards you. It is a ragged mummy, wrapped head to toe in filthy bandages. He advances, shuffling, one arm reaching to grab you.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: An ogre, who was playing craps with the giant and being cheated, smiles an evil grin at the thought of venting his frustrations on you.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: An ogre advances from behind the altar.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Battling the goblin is a man in bright chain mail. "Don't stand there, fool!" he cries.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: As you enter, a dark man rises to his feet. "You are not a jailer," he says. "My name is Abdul." He seems tense.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A man lies weeping on the floor. "Please don't hurt me again," he whimpers. "I just don't want to be hurt. I'll do anything you want." He turns, and jumps when he sees you.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A cobra hisses, coiled on the jewels in the chest!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The statue howls in pain and roars with anger. The demon Ngurct is before you!

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: slave girl

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The slave girl smiles as she pulls herself loose of the ropes that bound her. "I don't have the words to thank you!"

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: "Pssst!" You pause at the whisper. "Hey stupid!" it says. You look and see a dark man hiding in the rubble. "Another mercenary after the reward on Princess Thera! Maybe we can work together, or..." He peers at you, sword at the ready.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A whirlwind scatters the dust into a cloud, from which comes a man in a black silk tunic. "I'm alive!" he cries. "Alive! Now I have the power of death!" He slides an evil sword from its scabbard. "And for you? A just reward!"

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A thunderclap slams your ears. From out of thin air leaps a Norse barbarian, a lion's mane around his shoulders and a two-handed broadsword in his hand. "Hi! I'm Hero!"

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A troll leaps out of the shadows!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a bugbear wearing a greasy apron and smoking a fat cigar. He hears you come in and turns, boredly, frying pan in hand. He sees you're not a moocher, exactly, and gets a death grip on the pan.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The bugbear's competition scurries to his shiny orc-feet and grabs an axe.

Collection.name: FreeUids
Collection.type: System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.Int64, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089
